name: Under Love Demo
description:
Under Love follows a story of a devil that was alone in the hell so he fell in love but something happened and he went for a rescue mission

This is a Demo

Go in every level of the underground hell

don't be angry just remember that every level is possible

Under Love is a demo version of the full game that will be uploaded in a few months till then Support,Feedback,Donations.

This game duration lasts for 15-20 min

Controls

Movement - WAD

Jump - W or SPACE

Future Plans 

Better art (you can help with that by donating)

Longer levels

Chapters

Bosses

Now download the game and Have Fun
